full_summary:
**Development and Parameterization of an Ecosystem Model**

**Tender Announcement Reference**

* Title/Titre: Development and parameterization of an ecosystem model in the SpaDES platform
* Reference Number/Numero de reference: cb-19-74136249
* Amendment Number/Numero de modification: 3
* Solicitation Number/Numero de sollicitation: NRCAN-5000078028

**Tender Overview**

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) intends to award a contract to a supplier for the development and parameterization of an ecosystem model in the SpaDES platform. This project aims to assess the natural range of variation in ecosystem characteristics, including tree composition, age, and boreal landbird habitat, in northern Ontario.

**Contract Details**

* Contracting Entity/Faisant appel: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* Contracting Entity Address/Adresse de l’entité contractante:
	+ Address/Adresse: 506 Burnside Road West
	+ City/Ville: Victoria
	+ Province/Province: British Columbia
	+ Postal Code/Code postal: V8Z 1M5
	+ Country/Pays: Canada
* Notice Type/Type d’avis: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Tender Closing Date/Date but grâce: 2024-01-17T17:00:00
* Amendment Date/Date de modification: 2024-01-17

**Key Requirements**

The selected supplier will be required to:

* Develop an ecosystem model in the SpaDES platform
* Parameterize the model to assess the natural range of variation in ecosystem characteristics
* Integrate the results as SpaDES-compatible modules that can be run over any part of the managed area covered by the boreal managed forest zone in Ontario

**Contact Information**

For more information, contact:

* Gerald Baran
* Email: gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Phone: (778) 350-9373

**Documents**

The tender notice and supporting documents can be found on the Canada Buys website:

* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28576/179663_pac_fr_jan-03-2024.pdf
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28576/179663_acan_en_jan-03-2024.pdf

Note: Removed unnecessary information,
